TopicTitle: Set camera focus to specific part

Articles.Content:
Hi

Right now the camera focus of a launched vehicle is around the center of mass. Is it possible to add a function in the part manager to "focus camera to part" like it was in KSP1?

I think there is such a feature already. Clicking a part with middle mouse button I believe focuses the camera on that part. It is a little bit wonky because it appears to just pitch the camera to look at the part, but once you start panning around you'll find that it's moved the camera's point of rotation to the selected part as well. At least, that's how it was working before the most recent patch. I haven't been in game since the update.

Edited March 20, 2023 by CiberX15
